sentences.sentence: The present duke inherited the title from his father.
sentences.translation: 现在的公爵承袭的是他父亲的爵位。

sentences.sentence: The duke perambulated the boundary of his estate.
sentences.translation: 公爵巡视他的庄园地界。

sentences.sentence: He made great play of the fact that his uncle was a duke.
sentences.translation: 他特别强调自己的叔父是位公爵。
